articles.title: The difficult question about Auschwitz that remains unanswered - BBC.com
articles.description: Post-war Europe looked at the horror and acknowledged the suffering. But another question about the perpetrators still needs making sense of
articles.content: January 27 was formally designated Holocaust Memorial Day by a resolution of the General Assembly of the United Nations in 2005. But how we remember the Holocaust has evolved over the decades and eve… [+9751 chars]
